title: [FEATURE] Support for JPEG-XL
body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem?

Support for JPEG-XL that is more featured and has better ratios than other formats.

### Describe the solution you would like

C# binding of libjxl or it seems that Skia "added limited JPEGXL support" in "milestone 98".

### Describe alternatives you have considered

N/A

### Additional context

_No response_

### Code of Conduct

- [X] I agree to follow this project's Code of Conduct

comments.author: SladeThe
comments.body:
Up!
At the moment, JXL provides the best lossless image compression ratio.
The encoder has very few parameters, so it won't be hard to add a wrapper.
